===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[enough]]
#: {{zh-x|他們 說 沒 吃 夠。|They say that they're still hungry. (''lit.'' They say that they didn't eat '''enough'''.)}}
# to be [[enough]]; to be [[sufficient]]; to [[reach]]/[[achieve]] a desired level
#: {{zh-x|我 的 錢 不夠。|I don't have enough money.}}
# to have enough of something; to have a sufficient amount of something
#: {{zh-x|佢 唔 夠膽 食 鳳爪。|He doesn't have enough guts to try chicken feet.|C}}
#: {{zh-x|我 夠 了。|I'm fine./I don't need more.}}
# {{lb|zh|Hakka}} [[serious]]; [[hardworking]]
# {{lb|zh|Hakka}} [[arrogant]]
